attributes.action: Ban vaccines being administered in a manner not fully tested in clinical trials
attributes.additional_details: There is insufficient clinical data to justify this approach, and the Government should ban any vaccine from being administered in a manner that has not been fully tested in clinical trials. This would prevent second doses being delayed or one vaccine substituted for another.
attributes.background: Following advice by the JCVI and Chief Medical Officers the NHS is increasing the interval between the first and second doses of Covid-19 vaccines, and in exceptional circumstances being permitted to substitute one vaccine for the other for second doses.
